#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
void push(char);
void pop(void);
int top=-1;
char stack[405];
string s;
int main()
{	
    int cases,i;
    cin>>cases;
    while(cases--)
    {
        memset(stack,'\0',sizeof(stack));s.clear();
        cin>>s;
        int len = s.length();
        //cout<<"Length: "<<len;
        for(i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
            if(s[i]=='('||s[i]=='+'||s[i]=='-'||s[i]=='^'||s[i]=='*'||s[i]=='/')
                push(s[i]);
            else
            {    
                if(isalpha(s[i]))
                 cout<<s[i];
                else
                { 
                    if(s[i]==')')
                            pop();
                }
            }
        } 
        cout<<endl;
    }
  	return 0;
}
void push(char ch)
{
    top++;
    stack[top]=ch;
}
void pop()
{
    while(stack[top]!='(')
    {
        cout<<stack[top];
        top--;
    }
    stack[top--]='\0';
}
